name: Paintbrush Panic
description:
Welcome to Paintbrush Panic! In this game you will draw lines to get to the end of the level.

Controls:

Left click and drag to draw lines

Right click to erase the current line

Space to Jump

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

E + Near a door to go to the next level

Esc to Pause

q, r, f, and t can change to different colors

Have Fun and Enjoy!
